Class QuadBranch

  • java.lang.Object
    • QuadBranch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class QuadBranch
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class that stores Entities. If the number of Entities in a branch exceeds the value specified by maxSize, the branch will recursively divide its Entities amongst 4 smaller QuadBranches. This is to make retrieval and collision checking more efficient.

    If an Entity occupies more than one of the new QuadBranches, then that Entity remains stored in the original QuadBranch.

    North-east QuadBranch -> larger x; larger y;
    North-west QuadBranch -> smaller x; larger y;
    South-west QuadBranch -> smaller x; smaller y;
    South-east QuadBranch -> larger x; smaller y;

    Note that unlike here, y-coordinates are inverted in Graphics.

    Currently does not implement any mechanism for merging children QuadBranches.

    Author:
    Jiayin Huang, Sally Hui, Tony Cui
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • leaves

        private java.util.List<Entity> leaves
        A list of all of the Entities that are entirely enclosed by this QuadBranch.

      • noncommittals

        private java.util.List<Entity> noncommittals
        A list of all of the Entities that are only partially in this QuadBranch.

      • parent

        private QuadBranch parent
        The parent QuadBranch of this QuadBranch, or null if there is no parent.

      • children

        private QuadBranch[] children
        The four children QuadBranches of this QuadBranch, or null if there are no children.

      • maxSize

        public int maxSize
        The maximum number of Entities that can be held by this QuadBranch before it divides. This value includes both Entities that are entirely enclosed by this QuadBranch as well as noncommittal Entities that are only partially in this QuadBranch.

      • maxDepth

        public final int maxDepth
        The maximum depth that this QuadBranch structure will go before ceasing to divide any further.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • depth

        public final int depth
        The current depth of this QuadBranch. A QuadBranch will have a depth value 1 greater than that of its parent. For example, a root QuadBranch will always start with depth = 0, so all of its children QuadBranches have depth = 1.

      • size

        private int size
        The number of Entities and noncommittal Entities held by this QuadBranch. This does not include any Entities in any children QuadBranches.

      • bounds

        private Box bounds
        The Box representing the boundaries of this QuadBranch.

      • path

        public QuadTreePath path
        The QuadTreePath to this QuadBranch.

      • hasChildren

        private boolean hasChildren
        Is true if this QuadBranch has children QuadBranches; false otherwise

    • Constructor Detail

      • QuadBranch

        protected QuadBranch(QuadBranch parent,
          int quadrant,
          Box bounds)
        Creates a new QuadBranch with the specified parent and bounds. The quadrant parameter specifies which quadrant this QuadBranch occupies in its parent QuadBranch.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent if this QuadBranch; null is this is the root
        quadrant - this QuadBranch's quadrant number in the parent QuadBranch
        bounds - the Box detailing the boundaries of this QuadBranch

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(Entity e,
       Box entityBounds)
        Adds the specified Entity to this QuadBranch. Assumes that the invoker of this method has already correctly determined that the Entity is contained at least partially by this QuadBranch. If the Entity fits in a deeper QuadBranch, this method pushes the task to that branch.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to be added
        entityBounds - the Box representing the bounds of the Entity's shape

      • addNoncommittal

        private void addNoncommittal(Entity e,
                   Box entityBounds)
        Adds to this QuadBranch a noncommittal copy of an Entity that occupies more than one QuadBranch.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to be added
        entityBounds - the Box representing the bounds of the Entity's shape

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all of the elements in this QuadBranch. Calls the clear() method on any children QuadBranches, then sets them to null. Sets hasChildren to false. Clears the leaves and noncommittals Lists, and sets them to null. Sets size to 0.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Box box)
        Determines if this QuadBranch encompasses the specified Box entirely.
        Parameters:
        box - the Box to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the Box is contained entirely within the bounds of this QuadBranch; false otherwise

      • contains

        public boolean contains(double x,
               double y)
        Determines if this QuadBranch contains the specified point.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the point
        y - the y-coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        true if the point is inside of the bounds of this QuadBranch; false otherwise

      • determineBranch

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> determineBranch(Box box)
        Determines the quadrants in which the specified Box lies, assuming that this QuadBranch already has children. Returns an array containing the quadrant IDs of all of the quadrants that this box falls under. It is impossible for the box to fall under less than one quadrant.
        Parameters:
        box - the specified Box
        Returns:
        an array containing the IDs of all of the quadrants that this box falls under

      • determineBranch

        protected int determineBranch(double x,
                  double y)
        Determines the quadrant in which the specified point lies, assuming that this QuadBranch already has children.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the point
        y - the y-coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        the ID of the correct quadrant

      • divide

        public void divide()
        Splits this QuadBranch into four child QuadBranches, one for each quadrant. Removes all of the Entities from the leaves and noncommittals Lists, then re-adds them using the add() method. This splits the Entities amongst the new children QuadBranches accordingly.

      • get

        public java.util.HashSet<Entity> get()
        Returns a list containing all of the Entities stored within this QuadBranch. This includes all of the Entities in the leaves of this QuadBranch, and all of the Entities in all of the leaves of all child QuadBranches. This does not include noncommittal Entities that are stored in the leaf of a QuadBranch higher than this one.
        Returns:
        a list containing all of the Entities stored within this QuadBranch

      • get

        public java.util.HashSet<Entity> get(Box bounds)
        Returns a list containing all of the Entities stored in the deepest QuadBranch or QuadBranches that intersect the specified Box.
        Parameters:
        bounds - the specified Box
        Returns:
        a list containing all of the Entities in the QuadBranch specified by the given Box

      • get

        public java.util.HashSet<Entity> get(double x,
                            double y)
        Returns a list containing all of the Entities in the deepest QuadBranch that contains the specified point. This also includes all of the noncommittal Entities that are only partially in that QuadBranch.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the point
        y - the y-coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        a list containing all of the Entities in the QuadBranch specified by the given coordinates

      • getBounds

        public Box getBounds()
        Returns the Box representing the boundaries of this QuadBranch.
        Returns:
        the Box representing the boundaries of this QuadBranch

      • getChild

        public QuadBranch getChild(int quadrant)
        Gets the child of this QuadBranch in the specified quadrant. Returns null if the specified quadrant ID is invalid or if this QuadBranch does not have any children.
        Parameters:
        quadrant - the quadrant ID of the requested child branch
        Returns:
        the child QuadBranch in the specified quadrant

      • getChildren

        public QuadBranch[] getChildren()
        Returns the array containing the children QuadBranches of this QuadBranch, or null if there are no children.
        Returns:
        the array containing this QuadBranch's children, if any; null otherwise

      • getLeaves

        public java.util.HashSet<Entity> getLeaves()
        Returns a list of all of the Entities contained in the leaves of this QuadBranch. This does not include any children QuadBranches.
        Returns:
        the leaf Entities contained in this QuadBranch

      • getNoncommittals

        public java.util.HashSet<Entity> getNoncommittals()
        Returns a list of all of the noncommittal Entities that are within the bounds of this QuadBranch. This method goes all the way down to the deepest QuadBranches contained within this QuadBranch and retrieves all of their noncommittals. A HashSet is used to avoid duplicated.
        Returns:
        a list of all of the noncommittal Entities stored in this QuadBranch and in any children QuadBranches

      • getParent

        public QuadBranch getParent()
        Returns the parent of this QuadBranch, or null if there is no parent.
        Returns:
        this QuadBranch's parent, if it exists; null otherwise

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the number of Entities and noncommittal Entities held by this QuadBranch. This does not include any Entities in any children QuadBranches.
        Returns:
        the number of Entities in this QuadBranch

      • hasChildren

        public boolean hasChildren()
        Returns true if this QuadBranch has children.
        Returns:
        true if this QuadBranch has children

      • hasEntity

        public boolean hasEntity(Entity e)
        Determines if this QuadBranch is storing the specified Entity itself. Returns true if this Entity is present in the list of leaves. Does not return true if the Entity is found in a child QuadBranch of this QuadBranch, or if the Entity is found in the list of noncommittals.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to search for
        Returns:
        true if this branch itself contains the specified Entity

      • hasParent

        public boolean hasParent()

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Box box)
        Determines if this QuadBranch intersects the specified Box.
        Parameters:
        box - the Box to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the Box intersects the bounds of this QuadBranch; false otherwise

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Entity e)
        Attempts to remove the specified Entity from this QuadBranch. If the Entity was a noncommittal this method removes all of the noncommittal copies as well. Returns false if the specified Entity could not be found in this QuadBranch or any of its children QuadBranches.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the Entity was removed; false otherwise

      • removeNoncommittals

        private void removeNoncommittals(Entity e)
        Removes all of the noncommittal instances of the specified Entity.
        Parameters:
        e - the specified Entity

      • revalidateNoncommittals

        public void revalidateNoncommittals(Entity e,
                           Box entityBounds)
        Revalidates all of the noncommittal copies of the specified Entity.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to verify
        entityBounds - the Box representing the bounds of the Entity's shape

      • searchDownwards

        public QuadTreePath searchDownwards(Entity e)
        Attempts to find the specified Entity in the QuadBranch structure from here downwards, including this QuadBranch itself. Returns the QuadTreePath of the Entity if found, or null if not found.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to search for
        Returns:
        the QuadTreePath of the Entity if found; null otherwise

      • searchUpwards

        public QuadTreePath searchUpwards(Entity e)
        Attempts to find the specified Entity in an upwards pattern. First checks if the Entity is in this branch or in any children branches. If not, then this method goes to the parent branch and searches the three other quadrants. If still not found, this method does up another level. The search stops when the current branch does not have a parent.
        Parameters:
        e - the Entity to search for
        Returns:
        the QuadTreePath of the Entity if found; null otherwise

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
